info.title: Notify Service
info.description: Service for contacting respondents via Gov Notify SMS messages

source.description: The microservice that is calling the API

channel.description: The product that is calling the API

correlationId.description: The ID that connects all the way from the public web load balancer to the backend, and back again

originatingUser.description: The ONS user who is triggering this API request via an internal UI

caseId.description: The case, which must exist in RM

phoneNumber.description: The phone number, which must be a UK number consisting of 9 digits, preceded by a `7` and optionally a UK country code or zero (`0`, `044` or `+44`).

packCode.description: The pack code, which must exist in RM and the pack code must be allowed on the survey the case belongs to
